work.summary: Team-based development experience and familiarity with source code tools/process, bug tracking, code reviews, and other common development activities. Migrating various Mainframe based languages, like COBOL and databases like ADABAS to new open systems, using Java. Deploying webapps on Tomcat using a server side virtual machine with PuTTY. Stays up-to-date on emerging trends and technologies and ensures that they are integrated into technical solutions whenever possible.
highlights: Migrate various Mainframe based languages and databases to modern technology
Learned to use Docker for microservices
Learned to deploy webapps on the server
Learned to use Linux based Operational Systems, like Ubuntu, CentOS, RedHat Linux
Java AWT, Swing and JavaFX UI integration

work.summary: Team driving towards success and solving issues in the team. Introducing new members to the team and coaching them through new tasks. Excel in all performing Crew Member tasks such as quality control, register all tasks, dining room attendant, grill operator, bun dressing and fry station. Maintain fast, accurate service and ensure an excellent customer experience and make sure that all products are consistent with company standards.
work.highlights: Trust and respect throughout the team
Introducing new members to the team and coaching them through new tasks
Organizing hangouts for the team, which helps the team to stick together, which helps to increase the sales on the store
Managing delivery, helping in stock count and managing the money on the till
Hand out and manage the work in the team

work.summary: Establish and maintain governance processes by which supplemental capacity is determined, funded, justified and allocated. Ensure that contractual obligations for baseline capacity have been met and enforce thirdparty adherence to contracts. Tracking available baseline capacity and how it relates to annual budget.
highlights: Introducing new members to the team and coaching them through new tasks
Managing delivery, helping in stock count and managing the money on the till
Hand out and manage the work in the team
Ensure that processes are efficient and cost-effective
Motivate a team of people to succeed

volunteer.summary: Helping around to serve the customers and cleaning
